For each language you want, just double click the PROOF.MSI on the first folder. Then, go to the SP1 subfolder and double click on the executable file, the only file in the subfolder.
You need WinRar to get to the compressed files.

Hello, just wanted to say for those using Vista Home Premium and having the same problem as I did. "System has set policies to prevent this installation". You need to turn off the UAC(User Account Control)
You go to:
-Start(bottom left corner of your screen)>Control Panel>User Accounts and Family Safety(On Control Panel Home view, not classic)>User Account(Just press the title"User accounts" not the options below)>Turn User Account Control on or off, click to turn it off, restart then follow the steps mentioned before mine, like unrar, press the Proof installer then the update on SP1folder and it should install, it did for me anyway. Remember to turn UAC on again once you're done because it helps protect your computer, it's really important that you do.
